title: Practical Mathematics e-Learning for Working Professionals: Project-Based Problem-Solving Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening applied mathematical skills for solving workplace problems. Asynchronous/synchronous blended learning in a personal BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can solve budget allocation problems in work environments through mathematical modeling, achieving over 80% accuracy.
Learners can visualize organizational performance data and write interpretation reports using statistical analysis tools.
Learners can explain at least three mathematical concepts applied to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
